alert.note: Alert for Boise Mountains; Upper Weiser River; West Central Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 08 at 5:10AM MST until January 10 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Boise
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 5 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations 8 to 15 inches, except 15 to 24 inches in mountains above 6000 feet. Wind gusts as high as 45 mph on Tuesday. * WHERE...West Central Mountains and Boise Mountains zones. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 5 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Accumulating snowfall with very cold temperatures will likely continue through the weekend with another heavy snowfall possible Saturday.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Boise Mountains; Upper Weiser River; West Central Mountains
